channel.title: I Need Help With utorrent Connection
channel.description:
Hi I Have I need to portforward 43594 port with utorrent
I have got the port forwarding set up on utorrent but UTORRENT wont forward it.
So far i have
utorrent 1.8.1 -> preferences -> connection -> port used for incoming connections: 43594
(Y) Enabled UPnP Port mapping (Y) Enabled NAT_PMP port mapping (Y)added to windows firewall execption
but people still cannot connect to my server any ideas? :|

item.title: I Need Help With utorrent Connection
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

ok il giv u a lil tut,…

download utorrent 1,8,1 install it,

1, double-click, to open it…
2, goto --> options
3, then u will see preferences then goto - connection on the left hand side,
4, now u shud see - port used for incoming connectiong: and random numbers like [42154]
5, change the [random numbers] to 43594,
6, tick these boxes,…

enable UPnP port mapping enable NAT-PMP port mapping add windows firewall exception

that shud work if not then u must of dun sumthink wrong when u first starting making a server, :o

Read full topic
item.source: I Need Help With utorrent Connection
